{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.23860v1", "title": "The Kossakowski Matrix and Strict Positivity of Markovian Quantum
  Dynamics", "summary": "We investigate the relationship between strict positivity of the Kossakowski
matrix, irreducibility and positivity improvement properties of Markovian
Quantum Dynamics. We show that for a Gaussian quantum dynamical semigroup
strict positivity of the Kossakowski matrix implies irreducibility and, with an
additional technical assumption, that the support of any initial state is the
whole space for any positive time.", "main_category": "quant-ph", "categories": "quant-ph", "published": "2025-03-31T09:07:26Z"}
